international.title: US military preparing for potentially weeks-long Iran operations
international.desc: The US military is preparing for potentially weeks-long operations against Iran, according to exclusive Reuters report. The preparations come amid escalating tensions in the Middle East region.

international.title: Trump described as global 'wrecking ball' by European security experts
international.desc: European security experts at the Munich Security Conference describe President Trump as a global 'wrecking ball' destroying the postwar international order in a new report.

international.title: Ukraine aid surges amid continued fighting against Russia
international.desc: UK and allies pledge billions in additional military aid to Ukraine as fighting continues against Russia. Latest headlines also cover Cuba's energy crisis and US-Iran tensions.

international.title: Data center M&A outlook robust in 2026 despite power and AI risks
international.desc: Data center merger and acquisition activity is expected to remain strong in 2026, supported by continued investor demand and limited availability of high-quality assets.

china.title: China biotech licensing boom to hit record in 2026 as pipeline swells
china.desc: China's biotechnology licensing is expected to hit a record high in 2026 as the industry's pipeline continues to expand, according to Reuters.

china.title: China summons Western envoys in Hong Kong over Jimmy Lai sentencing criticism
china.desc: China summons Western envoys in Hong Kong over criticism of Jimmy Lai's 20-year jail sentence, escalating diplomatic tensions.

china.title: China opposes US accusation against Chancay Port: foreign ministry
china.desc: China firmly opposes and strongly deplores the US accusations against Chancay Port, a major infrastructure project in Peru, the foreign ministry said.

china.title: China cracks down on anti-marriage social media content during Lunar New Year
china.desc: China's top internet regulator launches crackdown during Lunar New Year holiday to curb social media content deemed problematic.

hong_kong.title: Beijing vows 'measures' after CIA Chinese-language recruitment ad
hong_kong.desc: Beijing will take all necessary measures against foreign espionage activities after the CIA issued a recruitment video targeting Chinese military personnel.

hong_kong.title: Hong Kong journalists face 'precarious' future after Jimmy Lai jailed
hong_kong.desc: Hong Kong journalists face a precarious future following Jimmy Lai's 20-year prison sentence, cementing a climate of fear and self-censorship since the national security law.

hong_kong.title: Hong Kong to see 11.38 million inbound and outbound trips during Lunar New Year
hong_kong.desc: Hong Kong is expected to see around 11.38 million trips during the Lunar New Year holiday period, according to the Immigration Department.

gds.title: DayOne Data Centers plans $5 billion IPO backed by GDS Holdings
gds.desc: DayOne, backed by Chinese data center operator GDS Holdings, aims for a valuation as high as $20 billion and could potentially go public within the year.

gds.title: Data center networking market to expand at 17.6% CAGR through 2030
gds.desc: The global data center networking market is expected to grow from $45.8 billion in 2025 to $103 billion by the end of 2030.

gds.title: Meta AI data center expansion raises new accounting and regulatory questions
gds.desc: Meta's AI data center expansion raises new accounting and regulatory questions as the company continues to invest heavily in infrastructure.

ai.title: OpenAI removes access to sycophancy-prone GPT-4o model
ai.desc: OpenAI ceases access to five legacy ChatGPT models including GPT-4o, which was at the center of lawsuits concerning user self-harm and AI psychosis.

ai.title: OpenAI retires GPT-4o, sparking backlash from devoted ChatGPT users
ai.desc: OpenAI retires its popular GPT-4o model, sparking backlash from users who developed emotional attachments to the chatbot companion.

ai.title: OpenAI accuses China's DeepSeek of stealing AI technology
ai.desc: OpenAI accuses DeepSeek of training AI by distilling US models and bypassing access restrictions through obfuscated third-party routers.

ai.title: DeepSeek expands context window tenfold amid China's AI race
ai.desc: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek upgrades its flagship model with significantly expanded context window and more up-to-date knowledge.

ai.title: OpenAI debuts Codex-Spark powered by Cerebras infrastructure
ai.desc: OpenAI rolls out GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark, its first model built specifically for real-time coding inside Codex, optimized for ultra-low latency.

ai.title: Chinese AI models festoon Spring Festival a year after DeepSeek shock
ai.desc: Chinese AI firms release new models ahead of DeepSeek's next-generation V4 launch, marking one year since the initial DeepSeek shock.

ai.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health with patient portal integration
ai.desc: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health, a dedicated space where users can link patient portals and ask questions grounded in their own medical data.

ai.title: RIP 4o: OpenAI officially kills its popular ChatGPT model
ai.desc: OpenAI officially deprecates GPT-4o on Valentine's Day eve, leaving users angry and grieving, with some comparing it to losing their companions.
